job.title: Junior Data Scientist
job.description: Job DescriptionThe Global Servicing Network (GSN) organization delivers extraordinary customer care to Card Members, merchants, and commercial clients around the world, while providing world-class credit, collections and fraud services. The Big Data and Advanced Analytics team provided models to enhance and compliment the existing processes accross the organization. Purpose Of The RoleRegularly engage with business teams to understand their needs and requirements and operationalize a framework for deploying Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing modelsPrototype and deploy use cases for Machine learning in the global Servicing Network (GSN) operating environment and ability to operationalize into workable algorithms & solutions. The role is expected to provide strategic guidance using Machine Learning and NLP across multiple operating areas within our GSN including structed and unstructured text mining to help business requirements.It is also expected that role brings to the table expertise in Machine Learning and how best advanced concepts can be applied into GSN operating areasResponsibilitesConceptualize, test and prototype beta versions of algorithms independently and working along with business counterparts in larger GSN organizationRigorous testing of algorithms as per business norms and delivering significant working leverage over status quo and generate value for the business be on top of trendsCritical Factors To SuccessAble to explain technical terms to non-technical peopleProvide the business with the models that they need in a timely mannerBring innovation in Machine Learning technqiues to optimally deploy the ML architectureDrive structural improvement projects via Machine Learning and achieve the efficiency goalsBusiness OutcomesBring innovation in Machine Learning technqiues to optimally deploy the ML architectureDrive structural improvement projects via Machine Learning and achieve the efficiency goals Leadership OutcomesPut enterprise thinking first and always balance stakeholder agendasContinuously engage with the external Data Science world to track the new advancementsAcademic Background And ExperienceBachelor's or Master's degree surroudning Data Science or relevant field OR 3+ years of applicable work experience Able to use both Deep learning and ML libariesWork in the financial space is a plus but not requiredFunctional Skills/CapabilitiesDeep curiosity and questioning skillsAbility to create innovative data solutionsKnowledge of ML in areas like Fraud and Disputes modeling in a plusTechnical Skills/CapabilitiesComplete grip on Python environment and libraries (scikit, nltk, pandas and numpy). Working knowledge of PySpark is a plus.Knowledge of the Hadoop Infrastructure and how it worksBoth Deep learning (keras/TF) and ML (scikit/xgboost) is requiredKnowledge Of PlatformsPlatforms primarily Python/HDFSBehavioral Skills/Capabilities American Express Leadership BehaviorsSet The Agenda: Define What Winning Looks Like, Put Enterprise Thinking First, Lead with an External PerspectiveBring Others With You: Build the Best Team, Seek & Provide Coaching Feedback, Make Collaboration EssentialDo It The Right Way: Communicate Frequently, Candidly & Clearly, Make Decisions Quickly & EffectivelyAmerican Express is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, age, or any other status protected by law.Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions.
